item.title: Two Rolls of Kodak UltraMax 400
item.description: I’ve had a couple of rolls of film in my kit for a while now, and recently (finally) finished shooting them.

item.title: Exploring the Skywalk
item.description: I’ve lived in Grand Rapids, Michigan for over eight years, and only yesterday did I start exploring the downtown Skywalk.

item.title: Mushrooms!
item.description: Late summer in Michigan brings green, green, and… Mushrooms!

item.title: Green Is Not a Creative Color
item.description: Today it was cloudy and rainy the entire day… Which I love!

item.title: There And Back Again, a Fuji X Tale
item.description: If I said that gear didn’t make up a large percentage of why I love photography, I’d be lying.

item.title: A Rainy Day Makes for Moody Photos
First Spring Hike of 2023
item.description: It’s April and the weather has finally started to change for the better.

item.title: Old Friend
item.description: My wife and I moved to West Michigan in 2015, and I quickly learned about the plentiful and beautiful locations to hike and spend time in nature.

item.title: Photos - Back Into Nature
item.description: I haven’t been on a hike in an embarrassingly long time.

item.title: Photos - This Round's In The House
item.description: For whatever reason, be it lack of motivation, bad weather, business, or whatever, I just haven’t gotten out to take many photos this year.

item.title: Film Photography
item.description: Why I got into photography # Of all the artistic mediums that Iâ€™ve tried, only one has stuck with me as something that I truly love: photography.
